meanings.definition: A type of pasta in the form of long, flat ribbons
meanings.sent1: I cooked tagliatelle for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious tagliatelle with tomato sauce.
meanings.sent3: Tagliatelle danced in the boiling water as it cooked.
meanings.sent4: The tagliatelle stretched across the plate like a golden ribbon.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly cooked tagliatelle filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To prepare or serve tagliatelle pasta
meanings.sent1: She carefully tagliatelled the pasta before adding the sauce.
meanings.sent2: The chef tagliatelles the pasta with precision and skill.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally tagliatelled the pasta too early, and it got cold.
meanings.sent4: The way she tagliatelled the pasta was like watching an artist at work.
meanings.sent5: The restaurant tagliatelles their pasta to perfection every time.
